title: "Surreal Space Odyssey"
content:
Welcome to our website, where we take you on a journey through the surreal depths of space. Our abstract image of a spaceship traveling through a wormhole is just the beginning of the adventure that awaits you here. 

Explore our collection of otherworldly content, from mind-bending art to thought-provoking articles about the mysteries of the universe. Immerse yourself in the vibrant colors and patterns that make up our unique aesthetic, and let your imagination run wild.

Whether you're a seasoned space enthusiast or simply looking for a new perspective on the cosmos, our website has something for everyone. Join us on this surreal space odyssey and discover what lies beyond the boundaries of our known universe.

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"An abstract image of a spaceship traveling through a wormhole, with bright colors and surreal patterns."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
